name: chayns-doc
description: A documentation for the global chayns object for chayns development

scripts.pub:patch: npm version patch -m ":bookmark: Patch v%s" && npm publish
scripts.pub:minor: npm version minor -m ":bookmark: Minor release v%s" && npm publish
scripts.pub:major: npm version major -m ":bookmark: Major release v%s" && npm publish

author: Christian Nagel
